features: NOURISHING VITAMIN C CREAM: Our vitamin c moisturizer for face features an intensive blend of Vitamin C, Ferulic Acid, and Hyaluronic Acid. These key ingredients sit in a base of organic aloe vera and glycerin, ensuring an effective and hydrating natural skin care experience. This is your go-to vitamin c lotion.

NATURAL SKIN CARE: Say no to toxins! Our natural face moisturizer is formulated to skip the toxic ingredients. As close to an organic face moisturizer as you'll find, we use only the finest ingredients for our face moisturizer anti aging. This makes it the best anti aging moisturizer for face for women and men.

SUITABLE FOR DAY AND NIGHT USE: Elevate your skin care routine with our day and night Vitamin C cream for face. Whether you're seeking a daytime dry skin organic facial moisturizer or a nourishing organic moisturizer face cream, we've got you covered. For maximum benefits, pair this vitamin c face lotion with our Vitamin C Toner and Vitamin C Serum.

MULTIPLE SKIN BENEFITS: Formulated for all skin types, our Vitamin C moisturizer offers numerous benefits. Achieve glowing skin, reduce the look of age spots, and repair dry skin. Ideal as a face cream and moisturizer for face. This is our best anti aging moisturizer.

PROUDLY MADE IN THE USA: Love it or let us know! Our Vitamin C face moisturizer is designed for both women and men. As a family-owned business, your satisfaction with our crema vitamina c or vitamin c face lotion is our priority. Your skincare happiness is our commitment.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 23, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Brighten your Day
reviews.reviewText: I really like that this is lightweight cream that feels smooth and with just a little bit I have enough for my whole face. I have been applying this cream after the toner and serum applications, and before applying my 50SPF sunscreen. I have combination skin and this didn't make me break out at all. I like that it brightens my skin at the start of the day. I really like that it has natural ingredients and that it doesn't have other smell than the ascorbic acid.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 27, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Absolutely IN LOVE
reviews.reviewText: This product is amazing. It feels super nourishing on my skin. First, I cleanse & tone & then I moisturize with this product. I am so grateful I found it, because all of the ingredients are high quality and natural. It’s best to put this on dry skin (not wet), as it won’t blend well otherwise. It smells amazing and my skin absorbs it so well. You only need one or half a pump depending on your skin type. My skin feels smooth and LOOKS glowing. & it lasts the whole day! I’m only 27, but I feel younger when I put this moisturizer on lol. Definitely will be getting again!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 6, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I wish I took a before picture, I’ve had scarring from many years of picking at my face and in just a week of use it’s really faded the coloring from the scarring. The only issue I feel I have is the smell, for some odd reason it smells like bubble gum BUT it could just be me. I feel like my skin needed this because there’s a VISIBLE difference in my skin, it seems more “plump”, brighter and smoother. I’ll be purchasing this product again when I run out!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 30, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Get your vitamin c!
reviews.reviewText: I've been using Beauty by Earth since I received it and I have to admit it is a really good face cream, I am seeing results compare to other products, its not thick or too thin very lightweight, it haves a light scent to it smells pretty good, it keeps my skin hydrated and nourished, it's a must buy!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 5, 2024
reviews.reviewText: So light weight, refreshing, and hydrating. Keeps my skin glowy. Has a wonderful slight orange scent

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 30, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I love this product, I was looking for a vitamin C that really provides me hydration in this cold weather. I love how my face glows after putting it on. smells good. I highly recommend it!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 26, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This cream has helped moisturize my skin so well! I really struggle with dry skin, especially in the colder months and since implementing this into my daily routine, I have noticed a huge improvement. It smells amazing and a little bit goes a long way!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 28, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars The smell is irritating
reviews.reviewText: This appears to be a nice cream, but instantly I was set off by the smell when I tried it on my hand. Kind of smells like the perfume that lilys give off and I’m very allergic to those. I’ve smelled this in other face creams before. Maybe hyaluronic acid? It’s definitely not something I want to put on my face with this scent. I’m returning because of this and it’s not thick like people mentioned. Might be good for others but not for me.
